headline: JPMorgan Raises PT on TJX Companies (TJX) Stock, Maintains Overweight Rating
summary: The TJX Companies, Inc. (NYSE:TJX) is one of the 10 stocks that Jim Cramer and analysts are watching. On June 2, JPMorgan raised the price target on the stock to $145 from $130 and maintained an Overweight rating. In the second half of May, the company’s price target was also raised by Loop Capital, Baird, […]

headline: Discount Retailer Stocks Q1 Results: Benchmarking TJX (NYSE:TJX)
summary: As the craze of earnings season draws to a close, here’s a look back at some of the most exciting (and some less so) results from Q1. Today, we are looking at discount retailer stocks, starting with TJX (NYSE:TJX).
